nodes.text: Fedalle was a terrestrial planet within the galaxy's Core Worlds. It was connected via the Hydian Way hyperspace route to the planets Skako and Bellassa. A separate hyperspace lane connected it to the planet Kuat.

Fedalle was first mentioned in the The Jedi Academy Sourcebook, a piece of supplementary material Star Wars Legends released by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game in 1996. The world was confirmed to exist in canon when it appeared on a galactic map included with The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games on August 4, 2016.
